    module:TiledMap

    Class representing a Map built from Tiled data.

    Constructor

    new module:TiledMap()

    Source:
    • tiledMap.mjs, line 10

    Methods

    getAssetPaths() → {array}

    Source:
    • tiledMap.mjs, line 28
    Returns:
    Type:
    array
    Array of path strings or plain objects with a "path" and "reviver" function (for JSON)

    onAssetsLoaded(assets)

    Event handler function - Store downloaded assets
    Source:
    • tiledMap.mjs, line 46
    Parameters:
    Name Type Description
    assets Object Plain object that works as an associative array. Each item key is a path from "getAssetPaths()"

    populateLayerCanvases()

    Creates and draws canvases for each layer in this.layers. Only non-animated tiles are drawn.
    Source:
    • tiledMap.mjs, line 157

    populateLayers(layers)

    Creates in-memory representations of layers and objects using given layers data.
    Source:
    • tiledMap.mjs, line 115
    Parameters:
    Name Type Description
    layers Array.<Object> Array of plain objects representing layer data.

    populateTiles(tilesets)

    Creates in-memory representations of tiles using given tilesets.
    Source:
    • tiledMap.mjs, line 71
    Parameters:
    Name Type Description
    tilesets Array.<Object> Array of plain objects representing tileset data.

    render(context, layerName, timestamp, sX, sY, sW, sH, dX, dY, dW, dH)

    Render given area of a layer.
    Source:
    • tiledMap.mjs, line 263
    Parameters:
    Name Type Description
    context CanvasRenderingContext2D Provides API to draw on a canvas.
    layerName string Key referencing layer in this.layers.
    timestamp DOMHighResTimeStamp Current time in milliseconds.
    sX number x-coordinate at top left of source in pixels from left.
    sY number y-coordinate at top left of source in pixels from left.
    sW number width of source in pixels.
    sH number height of source in pixels.
    dX number x-coordinate at top left of destination in pixels from left.
    dY number y-coordinate at top left of destination in pixels from left.
    dW number width of destination in pixels.
    dH number height of destination in pixels.

    renderAnimatedTiles(context, layerName, time, tileX1, tileY1, tileX2, tileY2, dX, dY, scaleW, scaleH)

    Render animated tiles within the given area of a layer (tile frame depends on given time).
    Source:
    • tiledMap.mjs, line 210
    Parameters:
    Name Type Description
    context CanvasRenderingContext2D Provides API to draw on a canvas.
    layerName string Key referencing layer in this.layers.
    time DOMHighResTimeStamp Time in milliseconds since first render.
    tileX1 number x-coordinate at top left in number of tiles from left.
    tileY1 number y-coordinate at top left in number of tiles from left.
    tileX2 number x-coordinate at bottom right in number of tiles from left.
    tileY2 number y-coordinate at bottom right in number of tiles from left.
    dX number x-coordinate at top left of destination in pixels from left.
    dY number y-coordinate at top left of destination in pixels from left.
    scaleW number scaling for width.
    scaleH number scaling for height.
